entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and overnight. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
